name: governorate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an area controlled by a governor, especially in Arab countries: Aleppo is the capital city of Halab governorate in northwestern Syria. The city is the seaport capital of Alexandria governorate.
More examplesFewer examplesSome governorates have been amalgamated into a single unit.The current council does not represent the governorate.There are five Labour Departments, one in each governorate.
